articles.author: Matt Patches
articles.title: Rebel Moon 2 trailer looks like Zack Snyder’s big payoff for Netflix - Polygon
articles.description: Rebel Moon: The Scargiver arrives in April, just a few months after the December release of A Child of Fire. And it has more lightsabers.
articles.content: The trailer for The Scargiver delivers on the premise

articles.title: King’s Message Beats Ncuti Gatwa’s ‘Doctor Who’ Debut To Top UK Christmas Day Ratings; Watch The Address - Deadline

articles.content:
